We have refreshed the user's Bill Management access.
If the user is still having issues, please have them try the steps below. If that does not work, please have them provide the information at the bottom. We will be closing this request, but please reply back if the user has an issue.
Below are some steps which will assist the customer with common Bill Management issues and the necessary information to provide should these steps not work.
(1.) Log out of both Bill Management and the business.officedepot.com website by clicking on the "Logout" link at the top right of the page for each.
(2.) Within the current Internet browser delete your cookies and cache
(3.) Close ALL internet browser windows and tabs
(4.) Wait 30 seconds
(5.) Reopen your internet browser
(6.) Log onto business.officedepot.com and access Bill Management again
(7.) Bill Management works best with Internet Explorer, if you are using another browser (ie Safari, Chrome, Firefox) please log out completely of the business.officedepot.com website and begin again in Internet Explorer.
(8.) Make sure your personal computer allows pop ups.
After following each of these steps if the user continues to receive an error message and/or is unable to access Bill Management, IT is requesting the below information from the customer:
• Account number: • Account name: • The user login and password: • Contact name, email address, and telephone number: • Detailed explanation as to what steps the user is taking: • Screenshot of the error: • Internet browser & version the user is using:
